@graph.schema:name: FieldCell
@graph.schema:description: Represents a data standard for capturing decision information fragments, projectable into a global multidimensional decision space.

@graph.schema:name: ID
@graph.schema:description: Globally unique identifier for a FieldCell.

@graph.schema:name: Parent
@graph.schema:description: Links the cell to a parent via the parent cell's ID.

@graph.schema:name: Coordinate
@graph.schema:description: Represents a coordinate in the multidimensional decision space.

@graph.schema:name: Coordinates
@graph.schema:description: An array of coordinates, each positioning the FieldCell in a specific dimension of the global multidimensional decision space.

@graph.schema:name: Coordinate
@graph.schema:description: A combination of a global dimension identifier and a value that positions the cell within that dimension.

@graph.schema:name: Dimension Identifier
@graph.schema:description: A global identifier for a dimension in the decision space.

@graph.schema:name: Positioning Value
@graph.schema:description: The value that positions the FieldCell within the specified dimension.
